trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert 32-bit signed integer objects to and from data source control cache duration representations.
trans-unit.target: Gir et typen konverteringsprogram for å konvertere 32-biters heltall med fortegn objekter til og fra datakilde kontrollen hurtigbufferen varighet representasjoner.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET data source controls that support caching typically provide a `CacheDuration` property that you can set to the number of seconds that the control caches data.
trans-unit.target: Angi ASP.NET kilde kontroller som støtter hurtigbufring vanligvis en `CacheDuration` egenskap at du kan angi antallet sekunder kontrollen bufrer data.

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents "Infinite" in these caching contexts, and the DataSourceCacheDurationConverter class takes care of this explicit conversion.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0 representerer "Uendelig" i disse hurtigbufring kontekster, og klassen DataSourceCacheDurationConverter tar seg av dette eksplisitt konvertering.

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not use the DataSourceCacheDurationConverter class.
trans-unit.target: Siden utviklere bruker ikke DataSourceCacheDurationConverter-klassen.

trans-unit.source: Control developers who are developing data source controls that support caching use this type converter along with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute to decorate a property that represents a cache duration setting of a custom data source control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere som utvikler kontroller for datakilden som støtter hurtigbufring bruker denne typen konvertering sammen med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>attributtet som overflate en egenskap som representerer en innstilling for hurtigbufferen for en egendefinert datakildekontroll.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> can convert an object in the given source type to an <xref:System.Int32> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> kan konvertere et objekt i den angitte kildetypen til en <xref:System.Int32>objektet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> class explicitly handles `string` types.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>klassen eksplisitt behandler `string` typer.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it calls on its base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, to make the determination.
trans-unit.target: Kaller ellers på basisklassen dens <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>å opprette fastsettelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents a type that the converter converts.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer en type som konverteringen konverterer.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre operasjonen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> instance can convert an object to the given destination type.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> forekomsten kan konvertere et objekt til den angitte måltypen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> explicitly handles conversion to `string` and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> types.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>behandler eksplisitt konvertering til `string` og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>typer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it calls on its base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, to make the determination.
trans-unit.target: Kaller ellers på basisklassen dens <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>å opprette fastsettelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to which you want to convert.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre operasjonen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to an <xref:System.Int32> object.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer det angitte objektet til en <xref:System.Int32>objektet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The ConvertFrom method converts an <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> string or the string "Infinite" to the value 0.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ConvertFrom konverterer en <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>streng eller streng "Uendelige" med verdien 0.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Other values are handled by the base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.
trans-unit.target: Andre verdier behandles av basisklassen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture in which to represent the number.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som angir kulturen som representerer hvor.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal konverteres.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer konverterte verdien.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed in the value parameter, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> er sendt i parameteren verdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> returneres.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to another type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer det angitte objektet til en annen type.

trans-unit.source: The ConvertTo method converts a valid value of 0 to the string "Infinite".
trans-unit.target: Metoden ConvertTo konverterer gyldig verdien 0 til strengen "Uendelige".

trans-unit.source: Other values are handled by the base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.
trans-unit.target: Andre verdier behandles av basisklassen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture in which to represent the number.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som angir kulturen som representerer hvor.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal konverteres.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: Typen konvertere til.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer konverterte verdien.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> instance is designed for.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling av standardverdier for datatypen i <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> forekomsten er utformet for.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that contains 0 for cache duration, which represents "Infinite".
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>som inneholder 0 for varighet for hurtigbuffer, som representerer "Uendelige".</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the collection of standard values returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Angir om samlingen av standardverdier ble returnert fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues*>metoden er en spesiell liste ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> class always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> collection returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is not an exhaustive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>klasse alltid returnerer `false` å angi at den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>samlingen ble returnert fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>metoden er ikke en fullstendig liste over mulige verdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> objektet støtter et standard sett med verdier som kan velges fra en liste med den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> object always returns `true` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method should be called to find a common set of values the converter supports.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>objekt alltid returnerer `true` å angi at den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>metoden må kalles for å finne et vanlig sett med verdier konverteringen støtter.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.
